itemList.name: Assault Rifle
itemList.description: Stop messing around, this is America.

itemList.name: Fancy Boots
itemList.description: These fancy boots will make you look so good the enemies won't stand a chance.

itemList.name: King's Bow
itemList.description: You swear to protect the King, and that fills you with determination.

itemList.name: Fighter's Armor
itemList.description: This armor is basic. Just like my ideas for these items.

itemList.name: Holy Grail
itemList.description: Misterious artefact. Nobody knows how it works.

itemList.name: Club
itemList.description: While wielding this weapon you become a professional baseball player.

itemList.name: Iannister's Crossbow
itemList.description: This crossbow is well known amongst the Iannisters. Seems used.

itemList.name: King's Crown
itemList.description: An old man's jewellery. I'm not sure how that's supossed to make you feel.

itemList.name: Lightning Saber
itemList.description: Powerful saber that seems to be imbued in some kind of magic.

itemList.name: Sinner's Whip
itemList.description: You've been a bad boy. Prepare to be punished.

itemList.name: Heavy Ship's Steel Armor
itemList.description: Heavy armor made of the same metal ships are made.

itemList.name: Diamond Armor
itemList.description: When you wear this armor you feel a bit cubical.

itemList.name: Longsword
itemList.description: Pretty simple longsword. Does its job.

itemList.name: Freshly Cooked Bread
itemList.description: The best bread you will find. Refills 150 HP.

itemList.name: Temporary Attack Potion
itemList.description: Is not like the developer didn't have time to implement Mana in the game and had to use this potion for another thing.
